website_summaries.verdict: The New Balance 910 v2 provides runner an impressive combination of protection, cushioning, traction and responsiveness. It is one of the shoes that will not disappoint when used in varied terrains. This New balance running shoe is great for daily runs, workout and daily running.
pros: It features the protective forefoot rock plate that is very useful for rough surfaces
The New Balance 910 v2 has a gusset tongue that keeps debris and small rocks from entering the shoe
Some runners took note of the impressive cushioning of the shoe
It provides superb traction for different surfaces
cons: The men's version is slightly heavy
Based on some reviews, the fit is not as impressive as the original model

customer_reviews.title: If you need waterproof AND wide, this is it.
customer_reviews.text: There really aren't ANY other options out there for wide-width, waterproof running shoes, so lucky that these fit and are comfortable! FYI, only one color is waterproof, the "Black/Grey"; on the photos, you can see the Gore-Tex tag (which does not appear in the other color's photos, so I'm guessing those are _not_ waterproof).
customer_reviews.author: Cook

customer_reviews.title: Trail shoe heaven.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are really well made and the comfort level compared to my other shoes is through the roof. I ordered a half size up because of the sizing suggestion and wish I would have just stayed at my true size. I'll wear thicker socks with these shoes to make up for it but if you wear thin below the ankle socks, stay with your true size. NB seem to accommodate a naturally wider foot so don't go too crazy on the wide width either. Switching from Nike, Reebok, and Adidas...Those shoes are so narrow and uncomfortable where as the NB feel like pillows on my feet!
customer_reviews.author: Doc714

customer_reviews.title: Mislabeled or Incorrectly Manufactured Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Received these shoes while on vacation. When I returned, I wore them for less than an hour and had blisters on my toes.It had to be the shoe that was mislabeled because I have been wearing this same manufacturer's size shoe for 10 years, and each shoe but this one fit well and I rated it 5 stars. The unfortunate part of this story is that when I went to Amazon to return them they said the shoe was past the return date. So I'm stuck with a high-priced shoe that was mislabeled as to size or manufactured incorrectly.
customer_reviews.author: Red Barron

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. These are labeled as 4E, but they are the exact same width as the Nike wides. New Balance is just slappin labels on shoes and shooting spit balls. They look very good, but we buy these for the width and comfort. Neither of which are acceptable on these shoes.Update: 2 stars if you work these with a shoe stretcher for a couple of weeks. Not good though.
customer_reviews.author: Spank Booty Phresh

customer_reviews.title: I think it's kinda cool.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something bright (LOUD) and different from the black, brown, or white shoes I've worn all my life. These fit the bill. The tip of the sole is starting to peel away from the toe and that is the reason for 4 stars. I would go 3, but I am VERY hard on shoes, so I have to give a little leeway. A word of warning - the color is a neon orange - but in the right light they look pink - if that bothers you, you should choose a different color. It does not bother me at all - In fact, I think it's kinda cool.
customer_reviews.author: Camille

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are extremely comfortable. At this point however
customer_reviews.text: This is the third pair of MT910V2 that I own. I bought this particular color because it was 83% off. This model was reccommended to me by an orthopedic because of it's width and stability. They took my orthotic inserts very well. The shoes are extremely comfortable. At this point however, I do not know about durability. I have not put on many miles. But out of the gate I love them! They do run a tad small in the length. I got 12 4E the first time and had to get 12.5 4E because they were just too small. The 4E fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Dubuque

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THESE SHOES... fit as expected, are waterproof or very water resistant (I haven't walked through a river with them but certainly keep feet dry in dew or recently rained on grass). The price was fantastic and they have held up very well to me wearing them in all conditions short of snow. I definitely will get another pair once I need to replace the ones I have.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe. Used for some major up and down hill walking along with work.
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the longest lasting shoes my husband has owned and worn religiously. They have finally worn out of tread and the insides are a bit messed up, but he has gotten some serious use out of these. Surprisingly he didn't blow out the sides which he usually does! Well Made! Will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Tani & Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Use the sizing helper
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to get shoes online, but in this case I'm glad I did. The shoes themselves are what I've come to expect from a New Balance sneaker, although I haven't put them to a hiking test yet. The sizing helper recommended 12.5, a half size larger than I would normally wear, but the fit is just right. As other reviewers have noted, these are sized a bit short, and you do want to account for it.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Turner

customer_reviews.title: btw these are amazing for disc golfing
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I've NEVER had shoes that fit my feet. In order to get shoes wide enough, they end up comically long. "Normal" people have insanely narrow feet apparently. So the shape ends up weird and my feet don't sit in the right spot according to the curvature of the shoe. Neither the arch, the heel, nor the toes can be right at the same time as another. FINALLY my toes aren't numb after a round of disc golf! Oh, btw these are amazing for disc golfing. Even running through fields of tall grass! The black/grey is waterproof, but it's a little more expensive (worth it).
customer_reviews.author: E.

customer_reviews.title: but based on my last NB shoes which are in great if dirty shape I think they will do fine
customer_reviews.text: They were large enough that I could fit an insole, which I need in all my shoes for medical reasons. I haven't had them long enough to give a creditable review, but based on my last NB shoes which are in great if dirty shape I think they will do fine.
customer_reviews.author: swan

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, Good fit, Durable.
customer_reviews.text: Very good shoes. I buy New Balance over other brands because they seem to have more "wide" shoe options than other brands. Also NB is a good fit for me with good styles. Excellent shoe, true fit (Bought online and had shipped to me overseas, glad they worked out).
customer_reviews.author: Mike Adams

customer_reviews.title: Solid trail shoe, a little big in the wrong places
customer_reviews.text: The shoes have a fairly flat arch, which I needed, so that was good. However, the shoes otherwise have an odd fit. This is the fourth pair of New Balance running shoes I have owned. These are big in the forefoot, and there is a lot of foot movement. It can be problematic for longer flat runs or even short trail runs.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: A nice shoe. But. I normally wear NB 12 4Es (Leadville 1210s fit very well, especially the older version) and followed reviews and bought a 13 4E. It still was barely wide enough, and so I'm returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: New Balance 910 good for stability and overpronaters...
customer_reviews.text: I'm an overpronater and need arch support. The NB 910 offers this, and is roomy enough for me to replace the NB orthotic w my own. This shoe was a particularly good buy because it's GORE TEX....not all are...look for the gore tex logo on the outside heel cup, if you want gore tex...
customer_reviews.author: NK X-COUNTRY SKIER/HIKER

customer_reviews.title: but these are awesome shoes. I have a Wide foot
customer_reviews.text: Yes the color is a little flashy , but these are awesome shoes . I have a Wide foot, and have become somewhat overweight due to some injuries . I wanted to get back into Trail running for low impact purposes . While also having a shoe that I could coach in . I have found both in this shoe
customer_reviews.author: Average dad

customer_reviews.title: New Balance Good, Fire Bad
customer_reviews.text: New Balance trail running shoes are the only ones I buy. Nikes don't fit- it's as if when making size 13s, the Vietnamese people manufacturing them think "no one has feet that big, why, my entire family could live in those" so they make them too small.
customer_reviews.author: BisonaholicTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: I love new balance shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love new balance shoes. Just replaced a pair of 510V2 N.B. shoes with these. Only issue is the shoes don't breath at all. I've never had a foot odor issue, but these shoes are the WORST. No air makes it to my feet all day and they stink! I've tried all kinds of powders, but nothing fixes it, because the shoes don't breath......
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Mackelprang

customer_reviews.title: FELL APART AFTER A FEW WEEKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: While the New Balance shoes fit as expected they come with what I would call a manufacturing defect. After a few weeks of use the soles delaminate from the shoe body in both the front which you typically see in cheap shoes after months of use AND they began to delaminate at the heal of the shoe which I have NEVER seen in any shoes! There is definitely something wrong with the the design, manufacture or materials used in these shoes in my opinion. I have bought New Balance Shoes for years and never had any fall apart like these did after a few weeks. VERY Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit, well made
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these and a pair of 980's at the same time. The 980's are long in the garbage, ripped on both shoes at the little toe. These shoes look close to new after 6 months with no issues at all. Comfortable also. This is a good looking shoe too. Not one you need sunglasses to look at.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoes.  Buy a 1/2 Size Larger than Normal.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable. Amazon recommended that I purchase them at a .5 size larger than normal (I normally wear 12Ds and I bought a 12.5D) and their recommendation was correct. So buy a .5 size larger. Padding is good. Provided laces are a little short if you're using the heel lock (back two lace holes).
customer_reviews.author: WMSigEp

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for a couple months until I work a large ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for disc golf. Worked great for a couple months until I work a large hole in the side of the toe area (apparently I drag my foot in this area when I throw). Not a flaw of the shoe, since they are designed for running.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: 1/2 size small
customer_reviews.text: New Balance shoes are normally a perfect fit but I ordered a new set on amazon thinking they should be the same shoe. I received them on time and in new condition but they are a half size smaller than the ones I have. I'm not sure why, I double checked all of the sizes on the tags and they are identical but when you hold them up sole to sole the new ones are smaller. Sorry New Balance you make a great shoe but I guess online ordering doesn't work. Not to worry I'm still a very loyal customer.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: i read the previous reviews saying to order a size ...
customer_reviews.text: i read the previous reviews saying to order a size bigger and i did and they were still tight, I own two other brands of NB shoes (610v5 and 690at) and both fit properly in my normal size, these were just too tight around the toes.
customer_reviews.author: Oni

customer_reviews.title: I love New Balance
customer_reviews.text: Buy one size larger and wider than your normal fit, trust me. I love New Balance, i always wear 13 wide, those would not fit in this model, 14 Extra wide was perfect. Love these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN MCMAHON (Oslo Woof)

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with these shoes
customer_reviews.text: The MT line of New Balance is so comfy and fits well out of the box. I do miss the 'wire line' in my previous shoes which are no longer avail (connected via the eye-lets, and the wire ran around your heel). I am very happy with these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: bodaciuos

customer_reviews.title: Tough to get the right size
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes, but I have had some trouble finding the right size. I normally wear an 11.5 or 12 4E in new balance but based on the reviews, I ordered this shoe in a 12.5 4E, which ended up being just a touch too big. So I ordered another pair in a 12 4E to see the difference and they are a bit small. So I'm returning the 12 and will stick with the 12.5 and a thicker pair of socks.
customer_reviews.author: john abernethy

customer_reviews.title: Love the color! Fits small
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit small. Very comfortable shoe! But they fit a 1/2 size too small. Whatever your running shoe size it order a half a size larger. Other than the size they are good shoes! I wish that they fit better.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for trail hiking
customer_reviews.text: The third pair the I have had. I use them for trail running and hiking. I have the goreTex model for backpacking. They are much better than my old hikers and they weight 1/3.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hayashi

customer_reviews.title: These will work and they are comfortable and time will tell how they hold up
customer_reviews.text: I bought a size up based on reviews, but I probably could have bought my regular size. These will work and they are comfortable and time will tell how they hold up. New Balance has always been a good show for me due to extra wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: michael f

customer_reviews.title: Great trail runners for wide feet.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are great one of the only options for wide feet. They do run small. Be sure to order them a half size large(follow the fit that Amazon's app gives you and you'll be fine). I've been having a heck of a time finding good trail runners. These have great grip on most terrains. My only disappointment is that the waterproof version only comes in the boring grey color.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Schilling

customer_reviews.title: I wish they made these in the orange colorway with Gore-Tex (note only the gray model has Gore-Tex) but they do look really good
customer_reviews.text: Ever so slightly loose in the heel but spot-on sizing (I'm normally a size 13 EE) around the toes. (These are size 14 EE). I wish they made these in the orange colorway with Gore-Tex (note only the gray model has Gore-Tex) but they do look really good nonetheless. After trying two different 13 EEs (Brooks and Asics) and reading others reviews about these, I finally found My Shoes!
customer_reviews.author: John Paul Jones

customer_reviews.title: I have worn New Balance sneakers for eleven or twelve ...
customer_reviews.text: I have worn New Balance sneakers for eleven or twelve years, always size 9.5. This shoe is just snug enough to make me go up a half size. Individual results will vary.
customer_reviews.author: DannyB

customer_reviews.title: noo shoos
customer_reviews.text: new balance shoes tend to fit somewhat wide, at least by comparison to nike's narrow fit. new balance always feel comfy to me, just have to find the ones that look good to me. these work.
customer_reviews.author: William White

customer_reviews.title: Good trail and walking shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe - I had to get an 112e due to no 102e being in stock and lucked out because it fit just right. Feels good, doesn't hurt the flat feet and provides enough cushion to go all day.
customer_reviews.author: PVFocus

customer_reviews.title: Thanks New Balance!
customer_reviews.text: New Balance carries sizes that actually fit me. 10.6 - 4E that is a wide shoe. These shoes are very well made and should last me. I'm hard on shoes. My last pair held on for 3 years which is extremely long for me to keep a pair of shoes. A huge plus for me is they are made in the USA. Thanks New Balance, for actually thinking about all the different foot sizes and making quality shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Richard S Jones

customer_reviews.title: No dogs a barkin
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed how comfortable my shoes are! I have an odd sized foot (12.5 4E) and New Balance comes through for me EVERY time. Please keep making half sizes and quality foot wear.
customer_reviews.author: Cesario

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These are so great, I ordered them for winter (in Texas) shoes, they repelled water as expected, they fit great and are sturdy for trail walking. Would definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: StarWarsDad

customer_reviews.title: I always appreciate the fit of the New Balance shoes ...
customer_reviews.text: I always appreciate the fit of the New Balance shoes. They are the same every time, and I can count on the wide widths of the shoes for everyday wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: NB Trail shoe at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Decent NB shoe, not quite as comfortable as the LeadvilleV3's i use for trail running, but these are ok.
customer_reviews.author: Jtech

customer_reviews.title: High visibility and support.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for high visibility and comfort when I am biking. They offer good support and comfort and very visible.
customer_reviews.author: John E. Sanfelice

customer_reviews.title: Not water proof
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed I paid a lot of money for shoes that we suppose to be waterproof these leak like a sive.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: a shoe that is comfortable on a 12 hour shift on cement
customer_reviews.text: Finally,a shoe that is comfortable on a 12 hour shift on cement! AAA+++
customer_reviews.author: Camoman1962

customer_reviews.title: My favorite trail shoes are the NB Zero V2
customer_reviews.text: My favorite trail shoes are the NB Zero V2, but they must have been discontinued because I can no longer find them. However, the new MT910V2 is a good replacement. (I purchased my first 910 earlier). I can't speak on the arch support because I always take out the foot bed lines and insert my orthotics.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Watson

customer_reviews.title: I like the way that they fit and the traction they ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of New Balance Shoes that I have purchased. I like the way that they fit and the traction they have.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Bopp

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit out of the box. Tongues slip a little bit I am not going to knock them for that. Great Shoes!!
customer_reviews.author: DAYTONAFREEMAN

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, see my review on the orange version.
customer_reviews.text: See my review on the orange version of the 910v3's as it is exactly the same as this gray version. great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this to any runner
customer_reviews.text: It was as expected from New Balance. They are the 1 running sneakers. Every aspect of this sneaker was what I needed for my feet. Comfort, arch support, ankle support and heal cushion. I recommend this to any runner.
customer_reviews.author: Koch

customer_reviews.title: These do have Goretex
customer_reviews.text: Just received these and these are the best fitting trail shoe I have ever worn. Out of the box they are ready for the trail. And I will confirm that they do have Goretex lining in them. There is a little tag on side of shoe indicating that. I would say they run a tad small. I normally wear 6.5 and these are 7 which fit great. Maybe even a little snug width wise.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J Bowie

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: well made, and fit as expected, but lacks support and stability for runners with pronation problems
customer_reviews.author: Mister Tibbs

customer_reviews.title: There is stitching right down the tongue that is painful. Flawed design
customer_reviews.text: Very uncomfortable. There is stitching right down the tongue that is painful. Flawed design. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Marecek

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and lightweight, though running on trails made them feel narrow in the toe box.
customer_reviews.author: Tom M.

customer_reviews.title: Love my shoes!!!! #Boombaby
customer_reviews.text: First I would like to stay THANK YOU to Amazon for the great customer service. These shoes are excellent, but they run really small. I first purchased size 11 wide ( fit snugged) returned them and got 11.5 (fit slightly snugged ) returned those and got size 12 (fit perfect) through this whole process Amazon was amazing so Thanks again Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: CheloMan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good off road runners for a variety of conditions. NB has some really great products.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Stankis

customer_reviews.title: There is a very steep curve after the ball of ...
customer_reviews.text: There is a very steep curve after the ball of the foot that led to an awkward feeling walking or running.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wells

customer_reviews.title: Consistent fit
customer_reviews.text: I always buy New Balance because the size is consistent, I know every pair will fit as well as the previous pair
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My husband has wide feet and New Balance is the ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband has wide feet and New Balance is the only style in a hiker/trail shoe we can find to fit.
customer_reviews.author: beverly moore

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoes, made in Vietnam is a plus for NB AS THEY MAKE MORE PROFIT
customer_reviews.text: NB , when U get the right size, it is a fit, but I need Decent insole. Not the flimsy on the send
customer_reviews.author: Magdy Fouad

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. I agree with other reviews...order a half size big. Very very comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.author: V lobos

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little small, but another 1/2 size would have been too large
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes, but runs a little bit small for me at 11. Got more comfortable after the toe guard stretched a little
customer_reviews.author: Nessie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy shoe, feels good, looks good. Not light feeling at all, but it is a "trail" show.
customer_reviews.author: DC Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes. I read a previous review and ordered ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. I read a previous review and ordered a size up from normal. That worked but it would be nice if sizes were standard. I like the shoes overall
customer_reviews.author: C.bing

customer_reviews.title: Buy at least 1 size larger,  great gore tex sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Great sneakers definitely run small I wear 8.5 wide and I got 9 to be safe. Fits Okay but only with really thin socks should have gotten 9.5 overall great goretex sneaker
customer_reviews.author: Jesse C

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a 12 4E in NB. Ran the size estimator program from Amazon via a pair of New Balance 980's (some of the most comfortable running shoes I have ever had) and Amazon suggested a 12.5 4E. I was skeptical, but got the shoes and was blown away - just as comfortable as my 980's. Broke them in with a 5 mile jog/run and experienced no pain whatsoever!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew H.

customer_reviews.title: New Balance 910V2
customer_reviews.text: Great feel and fit. Little warm since they are waterproof !
customer_reviews.author: M. Bethel

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like them after about 20 miles. They do seem a bit loose in rough terrain.
customer_reviews.author: TALewellen

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, great fit and nice looking shoe. The same quality I've come to expect from New Balance
customer_reviews.author: G. Clifford

customer_reviews.title: ... first time I wore them and they were quite comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Walked 4 miles in these shoes the first time I wore them and they were quite comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected, versatile all terrain workout shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Well made, comfortable, another great addition to my workout collection.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: good running shoes. these are the best shoes i have had in a long time. very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Predator

customer_reviews.title: Good light hikers
customer_reviews.text: Toe box a touch snug, but other than that a good pair of shoes
customer_reviews.author: Charles Siemen

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable as expected. I hope they last 10 years like my previous trail shoe has.
customer_reviews.author: B19000

customer_reviews.title: Shoes fit great!
customer_reviews.text: For the most part 8 1/2 EEEE shoes from New Balance work for me. I had only one instance where the shoe was too short (the width is usually okay). These shoes fit perfectly. I took them on a slightly muddy trail run yesterday for four miles and loved them! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Williams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality shoes made in Vietnam ! Best shoes I've purchased in a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Overall good sneaker
customer_reviews.text: I only buy new balance shoes they fit me very well. These continue the trend of well fitting sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: PR

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: For people with wide Feet (4E), the LeadvilleV2 are the best
customer_reviews.author: Capt33b

customer_reviews.title: Another great product from New Balance
customer_reviews.text: This shoe fits so well they are almost like slippers. I use elastic laces with them and have very happy feet. I have also purchased two more pair for backup. Unfortunately quality products disappear to quickly in the shoe market so if you find something you like buy in bulk.
customer_reviews.author: caroline bolliger

customer_reviews.title: NB Is My Only Shoe
customer_reviews.text: As a NB shoe tester these shoes are what the NB brand is all about. They are comfortable and durable. I use these more for an every day walking shoe. But for a beginner runner/trail these will be a great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Second Pair I've Purchased
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pair of these about a year ago. Couple of tries to get the right fit. The soles finally wore out after about 900+ miles of brisk walking on them. The uppers are still in great shape. Bought this new pair after doing a bit of searching as they are now last years model. Glad I found them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I only marked no on arch support since that's subjective ...
customer_reviews.text: I only marked no on arch support since that's subjective to the wearer as I add NB insoles to all my NB shoes for my flat feet.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Yockey

customer_reviews.title: Good for walking around but not trails.
customer_reviews.text: No arch support and built too light for trail running.
customer_reviews.author: TXmusicfan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Light, cushion, waterproof, traction for climbing the wet grass hills at The Masters.
customer_reviews.author: Tom C.

customer_reviews.title: Great but narrow
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes but a little narrow at the ball of my foot even for a 4E.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what was expected. Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is exactly what was expected. If you want a lot of cushion this shoe is not for you. If you like the "New Balance" feel then this is a great shoe. I have had them a few weeks and i have had no issues and have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Wilner

customer_reviews.title: nice fit
customer_reviews.text: Using New Balance size chart will help get good fit.
customer_reviews.author: P. Hilley

customer_reviews.title: buy 10 and you will be happy.
customer_reviews.text: Half sized too small so keep that in mind before you buy! Wear a 9.5, buy 10 and you will be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Rotunda

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe, one of my favorite ever, perfect for everything.
customer_reviews.author: Judgegavel

customer_reviews.title: these are great shoes and i am pretty hard on trail shoes
customer_reviews.text: these are great shoes and i am pretty hard on trail shoes. these are stable and provide great support
customer_reviews.author: james rinere

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: same size as other NB shoes but way to small
customer_reviews.author: Maui

customer_reviews.title: Perfect..
customer_reviews.text: I have neuropathy in both feet... Non diabetic. I'm a runner and road cyclist. For hiking and trails & every day wear... Perfect... I purchased the other colors too!
customer_reviews.author: Jammin47

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I have wide feet and finding wide shoes locally is damn near impossible.
customer_reviews.author: JMc

customer_reviews.title: Great trail shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great trail shoes! Unfortunately the foam cushion around the ankle split open after 2-3 weeks of hiking. In fairness to New Balance, we went with 4E's cause 6E's weren't available in that shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Gus

customer_reviews.title: Best New Balance
customer_reviews.text: Only brand I buy, these are the best I ever used. Very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Carlos The Grouch

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes. Feel like they are running a 1/2 ...
customer_reviews.text: As always New Balance, Great shoes. Feel like they are running a 1/2 size small. Pushing on big toe.
customer_reviews.author: mark fields

customer_reviews.title: Shoes awesome, Amazon sucks
customer_reviews.text: Ok shoes were awesome. Sizing not so much. I normally wear 10.5 EE and got 11EE after reading a bit about the sizing on New Balance. The sizing is off...way off. A full size larger is required. I could tell that these shoes would be comfortable if my toe wasn't James into the front of the shoe. Here's what really gets my goat. I think it's pretty chicken s*** of Amazon to charge $35 more for the next size up and it's not a prime shipment, so that's an extra 8 bucks. Same shoe from same place. Amazons not getting my money this time. So; 4 stars for shoes, 1 star for Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Buford Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes I am happy with the purchase and choice.
customer_reviews.author: Crock

customer_reviews.title: and they fit good. They seem like a solid made shoe
customer_reviews.text: I got one size larger than I normally wear, and they fit good. They seem like a solid made shoe. Only time will tell though.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Has held up very well over the past year, still look relatively new
customer_reviews.author: Billy Bada

customer_reviews.title: Great fitting great looking
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes fit great look great at a fair price
customer_reviews.author: brockdee

customer_reviews.title: Liked them so much I ordered a 2nd pair
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable trail shoe I've ever put on my feet. Average 8 to 10 miles a day in them. Liked them so much I ordered another pair in a different color 3 days after receiving my first pair
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: New Balance Men's Mt910 D V2 Running Shoes
product_meta.description: The New Balance MT910v2 Show Mother Nature Who's Boss Conquer any terrain in the New Balance 910v2 trail shoe. Featuring responsiveness, cushioning, flexibility, traction and protection, this shoe is for the runner who takes the road less travelled. Show Mother Nature who's boss in the 910v2, a multi-tasker offering the trail runner's triad of responsiveness, cushioning and protection. Enhanced flexibility, superior outsole traction and a lightweight REVlite midsole will help you stay on track. The upper of the MT910v2 delivers a durable construction that protects and supports the foot whilst retaining breathability via the durable mesh membrane. Allowing air to permeate within the shoe creating a cooler, direr more comfortable environment in which the foot rests. Protecting the toes and edges of the forefoot, the MT910v2 is designed with Toe ProtectTM which is a reinforcing rubber compound that protects against what nature throws at you. Sporting a REVlite midsole (An innovative foam compound providing the same responsiveness and durability of New Balance foams 30% heavier). REVlite offers a lightweight ride without minimizing construction or sacrificing underfoot cushioning or stability. One of the key features of the MT910v2 is the inclusion of ROCK STOP technology in the forefoot which helps to iron out sharp trail debris. The design operates around a flexible protective layer that helps protect feet from rocks and shock, and disperses shock energy. At the sole aggressive lugs find traction whilst a HHR rubber outsole (Hydro Hesion Rubber) stick to any surface offering enhanced traction when compared to a standard outsole compound.
feature_bullets: Breathable Mesh Upper - Allows fresh air to permeate within the inner of the shoe, creating a cooler, drier more comfortable fit.
Synthetic Overlays - Provide the right support, right where you need it.
Toe Protect - Rubber compound provides reinforcement and protects against the elements.
EVA Stobel Board - Provides a secure and comfortable footbed.
Debris-Free Construction - Eliminates waste, preserving raw materials and providing an environmentally preferred manufacturing solution
